QuestData.Title: The Mountain-Lord's Support
QuestData.Description: Alright, alright! If I knew ye could dance like that, I wouldn't'a asked ye to do all that stuff earlier.$b$bTell Overseer Oilfist that I'll be joinin' ye. I'll meet ye in the slag pit, $g lad: lass;! With the combined forces of Thorium Point and Iron Summit, those gorge-dwarves won't know what hit 'em!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report your success to Overseer Oilfist at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Overseer Oilfist at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: So, Rendan's on our side? About time that oaf came around.$b$bLet's get moving, then.
